title: Claudio Spontón
text: Claudio Ariel Spontón Imhoff (born 14 September 1968) is an Argentine <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Manager%20%28association%20football%29">manager</a> and former player who played as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>. He is the current manager of <a href="Club%20Atl%C3%A9tico%20Platense">Platense</a>.
